concept.definition: Depending on the context, the item of the related catalog entry may be added by the performer.
the related catalog entry supersedes this one when it is not active.
The related catalog entry is excluded by this one.
The item of the related catalog entry  will be part of the orders containing the current item.

text.div:
CatalogEntryRelationType

Types of relationships between entries.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/catalogentry-relation-type defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
triggers TriggersDepending on the context, the item of the related catalog entry may be added by the performer.
is-replaced-by Is replaced bythe related catalog entry supersedes this one when it is not active.
excludes ExcludesThe related catalog entry is excluded by this one.
includes IncludesThe item of the related catalog entry will be part of the orders containing the current item.
